name: Kya: Dark Lineage
description: In Kya: Dark Lineage, you follow Kya as she searches a mysterious world for her brother, Frank. She soon discovers that the only way to find Frank is to liberate peaceful Nativs, who are brutally oppressed by wicked Wolfen creatures. Fight your way through massive worlds using melee, combat, and magic attacks. Lead the rebellion through 50 main and side quests and more than 20 challenges in an effort to transform the Wolfens back to the Nativs they once were.
